sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: RACHORE a town and district of Hindustan, in the province of Bejapore. It is bounded on the north by the river Kistnah, and on the south by Tungbudra. The capital, of the same name, is pleasantly situated on the south back of the river Kistnah. Long. 78.52.E. Lat. 16.20. N.
